overview: Ever fantasize what really goes on at an adult movie set, before, during and after a shoot? EXPOSURE has the wild and wacky answer.  Your guide to this behind the scene expose is the delicious and outrageous Taija Rae, who plays three parts to give us the true picture. She plays both the snoopy reporter and bimbo porn starlet who does the wildest things under the order of the mad director – who also happens to be Taija!  EXPOSURE delivers what other adults movies only promise – a REAL not REAL view of X-Rated Sex on – and OFF the cameras.
title: Exposure
